result.execSummary:
The defendant Jonathon Hughes was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Narcotic Drugs, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(am).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: 3 years prison; 1.5 years initial confinement period followed by 1.5 extended supervision. IMPOSED & STAYED

miscConds.notes: $268.00 in costs forward $500 bond to DOC.  If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due. All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.
complete any counseling deemed appropriate by agent
AODA assessment  within 45 days and follow-through with recommendations

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt:
Defendant is eligible for the Challenge Incarceration Program ("Boot Camp").
Defendant is eligible for the Substance Abuse Program.

Defendant Jonathon  Hughes in court with attorney Michael Arthur Kelsey.  John Martin Yackel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Advised of rights; parties stipulate to facts; joint recommendation. PSI waived.  Defendant pleads NC to Ct. 1; court finds G and convicts on Ct1.; Sentence 3 years prison; confinement period 1.5 years; extended supervision 1.5 years;  IMPOSED & STAYED; court costs; probation 3 years; AODA treatment & follow-thru to be completed in 45 days by October 27, 2014; any counseling deemed appropriate.  Report to probation/parol today.  Forward bond to DOC

Defendant Jonathon  Hughes in court with attorney Michael Arthur Kelsey.  John Martin Yackel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
DEF acknowledges receipt of Information.  Advised of rights.  DEF pleads Not Guilty, NG plea entered by court.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 11, 2014 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Jonathon Hughes in court with attorney Michael A Kelsey.  John M Yackel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court read DE rights.  DE waived preliminary hearing.  Court finds enough to establish a bindover.  Arraignment scheduled for August 26, 2014 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Jonathon Hughes in court.  John M Yackel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  petitioned for court appointed atty was not on a vaild open case - so court denied request.   submit new peition for court appointed atty  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 23, 2014 at 11:45 am.
No contact with Crystal S. Streitz or Alex J. Willis

Defendant shall have NO CONTACT with Crystal S. Streitz.

Defendant shall have NO CONTACT with Alex J. Willis.

Defendant Jonathon Hughes in court via video means, in custody.  Attorney Bruce Poquette appeared for John M Yackel for the State of Wisconsin.    Defendant advised of rights/penalties, acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading of complaint, wishes to contact counsel.  State requested $500 cash bail with condition of no contact with Crystal S. Streitz and no contact with Alex J. Willis.  Court granted state's request for bond.
